briefTitle: GA YAZ ACNE in China Phase III
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of an Oral Contraceptive Preparation YAZ (Drospirenone 3 mg / Ethinylestradiol 20 µg) for 6 Treatment Cycles in Women With Moderate Acne
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of YAZ (drospirenone 3 mg / ethinylestradiol 20 µg) in comparison with placebo in female patients with moderate acne vulgaris over 6 treatment cycles.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Cycle 6 to Baseline in the Total Lesion Count (Open and Closed Comedones, Papules, Pustules, and Nodules) in the FAS (Full Analysis Set)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Cycle 6 (Day 15±3 days of Treatment Cycle 6) and Baseline
